application_information.description: The Contest app is an innovative play-to-earn application that allows users to enter contests where they can win top-quality products at a 99% discount. It guarantees a win for everyone who participates.
application_information.about_this_app:
# Contest

The Contest app is an innovative play-to-earn application that allows users to enter contests where they can win top-quality products at a 99% discount. It guarantees a win for everyone who participates. This means that users engage in contests through the app and have the opportunity to obtain high-quality products at significantly reduced prices, with assured rewards for all participants.

## Key Features:

- **Play-to-Earn**: Enter contests to win high-quality products at a fraction of the price.

- **Guaranteed Rewards**: Every participant wins a prize, ensuring a rewarding experience for all.

- **High-Quality Products**: Win top-quality products from various categories.

- **User-Friendly Interface**: Enjoy a seamless and engaging user experience.

- **Secure Transactions**: Enhanced security features to protect user data and ensure safe transactions.

For more information or support, visit the [Contest Help Center](https://contestapp100pay.vercel.app/help) or contact Contest support at [support@100pay.com](mailto:support@100pay.com).
application_information.required_os: Android 6.0> or iOS 12.0> or Web Browser
